# NETWORK::TEXTURE_DOWNLOAD_GET_NAME

## Parameters
* **INT** textureDownloadHandle: Handle to the texture

## Returns
* **STRING**: A valid string if the texture is ready to be used (both the TXD and texture names match), NULL otherwise

## Description
<!-- AUTOGENERATED: Remove this line before editing -->
Queries the name of the texture for a given handle. The texture cannot be used until this commands
returns a valid string.
